xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/121451-A Side, B Side, Seaside 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Chen Tian is a schoolgirl in Hong Kong about to leave to study at a university in Beijing. Before she leaves for good, she decided to spend an unforgettable trip with her best friend in a distant fishing village. There she discovers love for the first time. At the same village, Ah Mei who had a tough time in the city comes back home to the village to revisit her past. She finds herself reuniting with two boys from her childhood. A Side, B Side, Seaside
